name: Tangled Stars
description:
We follow the story of Jonah, a pessimistic university student who does not find anything interesting or exciting in his life, until someone changes this. 

In this universe, anthropomorphic beings (furries) and humans coexist in peace, well, that's what they want you to think. Jonah is one of the few people who think both races should happily live together in peace, but this way of thinking sets a lot of events into motion. 

Watch as Jonah's story unfolds as he tries to follow his heart and secrets unravel along the way. 

Can he establish peace? Can he find true happiness in a world full of corruption? Only time can tell.

Please keep in mind this is an early access build, it is very short and everything is subject to change, thank you for checking out my little vn <3
